Sentencas: The effect of ytterbia co-doping in scandia stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) on phase formation and electrical conductivity Was studied.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The ternary (ZrO2)(0.90) (Sc2O3)(0.09) (Yb2O3)(0.01) composition was prepared by solution combustion synthesis.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The powder was characterized by X-ray diffraction, scanning and transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The processed powder of the co-doped sample was found to be nanocrystalline and it exhibited a single cubic phase.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The powder was compacted in to disc and sintered to produce a dense electrolyte pellet.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis showed that the cubic phase remains after sintering in the co-doped sample whereas peaks corresponding to the rhombohedral beta phase appear in the sintered binary (without co-doping) scandia stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) sample.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity was measured as a function of temperature by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the ytterbia co-doped sample was found to be higher than the ScSZ sample without co-doping.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: Consequently the activation energy of the co-doped sample was lower compared to the ScSZ sample.
Titulo: Phase formation and ionic conductivity studies on ytterbia co-doped scandia stabilized zirconia (0.9ZrO2-0.09Sc2O3-0.01Yb2O3) electrolyte for SOFCs
